mapper.insert: insert into address_book (user_id, consignee, gender, phone, province_code, province_name, city_code, city_name, district_code, district_name, detail, label, is_default) values (#{userId}, #{consignee}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{provinceCode}, #{provinceName}, #{cityCode}, #{cityName}, #{districtCode}, #{districtName}, #{detail}, #{label}, #{isDefault})
